name: OpenColorado
description: OpenColorado is working to make public data available and accessible to the citizens of Colorado. Our vision is to support a transformation that will lead to a simple, beautiful, and easy-to-use government. We founded OpenColorado to achieve this new, more effective, and open government. This site provides access to a wealth of government data becoming available from participating jurisdictions.
